PrecisAppointment of the HONOURABLE ALETA CROMWELL, a Judge of the Provincial Court of Nova Scotia, to be a Judge of the Supreme Court of Nova Scotia (Family Division), and a Judge ex officio of the Nova Scotia Court of Appeal.
